'''2.3.462''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on October 20, 2022.

== Additions ==
* Added new default skins for {{el|je}}. Noor, Sunny, Ari, Zuri, Makena, Kai, and Efe.

== Changes ==
* Updated Minecraft Live page to show the results of the mob vote.
* Updated Minecraft Legends page to show new trailers & cinematics, and re-added allays on this page.

== Fixes ==
* Various bug fixes & usability improvements.
